name: Pachinko (Saulizimo)
description:
Controls:
Shift opens shop, that doesnt really have anything but 2 guns, one invisible.

Left mouse shoots. thats it.

Bouncing bullets from walls do double damage.

Mega kill mode increases enemies and ur speed over time if u keep it up. You achieve it by continuously killing enemies.

I didnt manage to finish the game at all, as i thought i could. I got lazy. I will finish this ´project later on with better bouncing bullet mechanisms, waves, maps etc. So follow if you liked the idea, but for now this is very generic quite buggy top down shooter.
